name: timeout
short: Allows admins/people with permissions to timeout members in servers
description: This cog allows server admins or users with appropriate permissions to timeout members in servers. A timeout is a temporary ban that can be used to prevent a user from sending messages or joining voice channels for a specified period of time.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any user data persistently.
install_msg:
Thanks for installing Timeout!
Please report any bugs/log output in *#support_other-cogs* on the cog support server (https://discord.gg/GET4DVk).
author: crayyy_zee
